subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Richard Jefferson had 19 points, rebounding from a poor performance in Game 1 to help the Spurs beat the Mavericks and tie their first-round series at one game each.
snippet: Richard Jefferson had 19 points, rebounding from a poor performance in Game 1 to help the Spurs beat the Mavericks and tie their first-round series at one game each.
